title: Is vicks vapor rub good for psoriasis?
description: Answer (1 of 11): Vicks VapoRub is sold as an analgesic topical balm to provide temporary relief from common cold, cough and muscle aches. But, due to the potent medicinal benefits of its active ingredients- Camphor, eucalyptus oil, menthol and thymol- it is widely used to treat various day to da...
